_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

PriorInformationNotice.description: A document used by a contracting party to declare the intention to buy goods, services, or works during a specified period.

PriorInformationNotice.title: Prior Information Notice. Details
PriorInformationNotice.description: A document used by a contracting party to declare the intention to buy goods, services, or works during a specified period.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Prior Information Notice. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Prior Information Notice. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Prior Information Notice. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Prior Information Notice. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Prior Information Notice. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CopyIndicator.title: Prior Information Notice. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Prior Information Notice. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

ContractFolderID.title: Prior Information Notice. Contract Folder Identifier. Identifier
ContractFolderID.description: An identifier, assigned by the sender, for the process file (i.e., record) to which this document belongs.

IssueDate.title: Prior Information Notice. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Prior Information Notice. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

Note.title: Prior Information Notice. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

VersionID.title: Prior Information Notice. Version Identifier. Identifier
VersionID.description: An identifier of the current version of the Prior Information Notice.

PreviousVersionID.title: Prior Information Notice. Previous_ Version Identifier. Identifier
PreviousVersionID.description: An identifier of the previous version of the Prior Information Notice which is superceded by this version.

RequestedPublicationDate.title: Prior Information Notice. Requested_ Publication Date. Date
RequestedPublicationDate.description: The requested publication date for this Prior Information Notice.

PlannedDate.title: Prior Information Notice. Planned Date. Date
PlannedDate.description: The date planned by the Contracting Party for publication of the contract notice.

RegulatoryDomain.title: Prior Information Notice. Regulatory Domain. Text
RegulatoryDomain.description: Information about the law that defines the regulatory domain.

NoticeTypeCode.title: Prior Information Notice. Notice Type Code. Code
NoticeTypeCode.description: The type of notice (PIN, Qualification, Reduce time...)

NoticeLanguageCode.title: Prior Information Notice. Notice_ Language Code. Code
NoticeLanguageCode.description: The language used for this prior information notice.

AdditionalNoticeLanguage.title: Prior Information Notice. Additional Notice_ Language. Language
AdditionalNoticeLanguage.description: An additional official language used for this prior information notice.

DocumentReference.title: Prior Information Notice. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A reference to another document associated with this document.

Signature.title: Prior Information Notice. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

ContractingParty.title: Prior Information Notice. Contracting Party
ContractingParty.description: The contracting party or parties in case of joint procurement.

OriginatorCustomerParty.title: Prior Information Notice. Originator_ Customer Party. Customer Party
OriginatorCustomerParty.description: A party who originated the tendering process.

ReceiverParty.title: Prior Information Notice. Receiver_ Party. Party

TenderingTerms.title: Prior Information Notice. Tendering Terms
TenderingTerms.description: The tendering terms associated with this tendering process.

TenderingProcess.title: Prior Information Notice. Tendering Process
TenderingProcess.description: A description of the tendering process itself.

ProcurementProject.title: Prior Information Notice. Procurement Project
ProcurementProject.description: An overall definition of this procurement project.

ProcurementProjectLot.title: Prior Information Notice. Procurement Project Lot
ProcurementProjectLot.description: One of the procurement project lots into which this contract can be split.
